title: Stock market on edge: Why this Friday could spark a massive rally or brutal selloff
description: U.S. stock market is tense ahead of Friday’s PCE inflation report. This is the Fed’s preferred gauge. Economists expect 2.8% headline and 2.9% core. A cooler print could spark a sharp rally. A hotter one could trigger a selloff. The data arrives before the De…
content: U.S. stock market is bracing for a pivotal moment this Friday: The Personal Consumption Expenditures Price Index, the Federal Reserves preferred inflation measure, will be released for the first time… [+3709 chars]
